text: Vera Bergman (16 February 1920 – 1971) was a German stage and film actress known for her roles in Italian films.Bondanella p.44 Bergman died in 1971. ==Selected filmography== * The Stars Shine (1938) * Maddalena, Zero for Conduct (1940) * Lucky Night (1941) * The Man on the Street (1941) * The Champion (1943) * Non canto più (1945) * Teheran (1946) * The Two Orphans (1947) * The Last Race (1954) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Bondanella, Peter. A History of Italian Cinema. A&C; Black, 2009. ==External links== * Category:1920 births Category:Italian film actresses Category:German film actresses Category:German emigrants to Italy Category:1971 deaths
title: Vera Bergman
